title: Just need help for PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED
body: my account has benn PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED and i didn't get any email from LOL. i just want to know how to unlock my account and what do i have to do with it?

replies.body: Riot don't unban an account once its been permanently suspended RIP
but i didn't receive any email and i need to know what's reason??

You were reported for killing too many Penguins. here's the TLDR.

"Please note that global warming is a reality and penguins are already suffering from the changes in nature, we cannot additionally allow summoners to be killing penguins or promoting penguin genocide through their League of Legends summoner names.

I hope you understand,
From Riot"

I hope that helped :)
but i didn't receive any email and Riot can't just ban my account without sending me a email and give me a reason.

Hey Mr Peng Killer,

Normally we send emails when permaban players. You should contact player support for more information but from what I can see, you recently purchased RP with credit card and then charged back (either you or perhaps parents?).
Have a check and once you have identified why this happened, please contact player support.
I'm not 100% sure (I'm asking but I have not received an answer yet) but I believe if you resolve the issue, your account will be unlocked.
